downloadTitle: Auto Accept Agent Deployment and Administration Guide
downloadDescription: This guide explains how to install, configure, and administer Auto Accept Agent, a store event sink that automatically processes meeting requests for resource mailboxes.
detailsSection: This guide explains how to install, configure, and administer Auto Accept Agent, a store event sink that automatically processes meeting requests for resource mailboxes. The guide leads you through the installation process, which installs Auto Accept Agent on your computer and registers Auto Accept Agent as a Component Object Model (COM+) component. After you have installed Auto Accept Agent, you then need to configure it and register the resource mailboxes on which you want this event sink to run. In addition, this guide provides you with troubleshooting information relevant to Auto Accept Agent.
systemRequirementsSection: • The file is a Microsoft Word document. Users who do not have Microsoft Word can view this document through the downloadable Word Viewer.
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the Download button on this page to start the download, or choose a different language from the drop-down list and click Go.
  2. Do one of the following:
    • To start the installation immediately, click Open or Run this program from its current location.
    • To copy the download to your computer for installation at a later time, click Save or Save this program to disk.
